abstract: Old Mutual has appointed JPMorgan Chase to look at a possible sale of its U.S. life insurance business, among other options, Reuters reported.
snippet: Old Mutual has appointed JPMorgan Chase to look at a possible sale of its U.S. life insurance business, among other options, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Old Mutual has appointed JPMorgan Chase to look at a possible sale of its American life insurance business, among other options, people familiar with the matter told Reuters on Tuesday.

headline.main: Old Mutual Considers Sale of U.S. Unit, Report Says
